title: 4-Minute Zoom Call and an Email: How the National Cycling League Abruptly Ended
content:
Dozens of riders and staff stranded without jobs following a brief, one-way phone call and short email Monday after the NCL ceased operations 'effectively immediately.'

Read the full article at 4-Minute Zoom Call and an Email: How the National Cycling League Abruptly Ended on Velo.
author: ahood
